snippet: Quinoa has numerous admirable traits and also happens to be kosher for Passover. Add fried leeks and roasted carrots for a memorable salad.
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column features a recipe for quinoa salad.
lead_paragraph: Quinoa has numerous admirable traits and also happens to be kosher for Passover. Add fried leeks and roasted carrots for a memorable salad.

headline.print_headline: Just Don’t Call It a Grain
